1.Description: You Find A small troll Encampment

2.Description: You find yourself in a large clearing with a belowing fire in the center

3.Description: You Find yourself in a clearing that has a small alter in the center

4.Description: You find a small campsite of some kind. You find a man standing by the fire

Attributes.description: the man seems to be looking South
Attributes.name: Athos
questions: My name is Athos I live here
The Ruins to the south I heard some strange noices earlier

5.Description: You find yourself in a small clearing type area looking at a large humanoid statue guarding a simple archway that seems to shimmer the air like a fire does but you see no fire in sight

6.Description: You find that moving through the brushes you start to feel as though your being watched

7.Description: you find a small cart in at the edge of the forrest with a man stadning at it

Attributes.description: The Exitable Woman stand by here cart almost as if she's Protecting her Cargo
Attributes.name: Kinja
questions: My name is Kinja I'm on a delivery mission!
Health Potions made for the war of course!
Can I have some of the potions?
That depends on if your willing to purchase one!

8.Description: You find that you see the sun starting to set through the breif glimpses in the trees

9.Description: You find yourself inside of a forrest beside what seems to be an old broken archway in the middle of a clearing in a forrest you also see a kind of alter holding some sort of orb
